mod.name: TheSwordswoman
mod.description: A mod adding the character Narmaya from Granblue Fantasy, who uses a dual stance to aid in battle.

cards.name: Fanciful Flutter

cards.name: Fanciful Flutter+

relics.name: Venustas
relics.description: At the start of your turn and whenever you change Stances, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Only a leader who helps people regardless of their background can wield this blade.

relics.name: Raikiri
relics.description: The third time you change Stances each combat, remove all your debuffs.

relics.name: Blade of Purification
relics.description: The first time you play an Attack that costs 2 or more each turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Those who completes this blade's trials are freed from all impure thoughts.

relics.name: Confection Cutter
relics.description: When you discard your 5th card each turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Using a Katana to cut chocolate is far from State-of-the-art.

relics.name: Eight-Life Katana
relics.description: At the start of your turn, add a random card with Reverb from your draw pile to your hand.
relics.flavorText: The fate of every living creature in the sky rests within its eight gems.

relics.name: Samurai Sword
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your first Attack each turn deals 1 damage.
relics.flavorText: A true Samurai can use any blade they come across. Even this model blade, Gozaru!

relics.name: Soshu Masamune
relics.description:
Replaces Venustas.
At the start of your turn and whenever you change Stances, draw 2 card, then discard 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: This blade shows its true worth only to those who have attained enlightenment.

relics.name: Vyxaba
relics.description:
Upon pickup, duplicate a card in your deck.
The first time you play a card each turn, add a random card with that card's name from your draw pile to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Oira! Punk! Witness the true power of Vyrn, the likes of which you have never seen before.

relics.name: Unsigned Blade
relics.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to yourself, gain 5 Block.
relics.flavorText: A good blade needs no signation from its maker, its wielder is enough.

keywords.name: Reflection
keywords.description: This turn, deal fully blocked damage back to the attacker.

keywords.name: Reverb
keywords.description: Effect activates once for each time you have played a card with this name this combat.

keywords.name: Stance Swap
keywords.description: Switch between Dawnfly Stance and Freeflutter Stance.

keywords.name: Trance
keywords.description: When you discard this card, activate its effects and its Trance effect.
